snippet: Bill Callahan brought his bone-dry baritone and the deadpan philosophy of his lyrics to Lincoln Center’s American Songbook Series.
abstract: Nate Chinen reviews performance by Bill Callahan at the Allen Room.
lead_paragraph: Bill Callahan brought his bone-dry baritone and the deadpan philosophy of his lyrics to Lincoln Center’s American Songbook Series.

headline.seo: Bill Callahan Show at Jazz at Lincoln Center
headline.main: Bone-Dry Baritone With More Than a Touch of Wry
